Package geometries

Class RadialGeometry

java.lang.Object
geometries.Geometry
geometries.RadialGeometry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Sphere, Tube
public abstract class RadialGeometry
extends Geometry
Abstract class to represent all geometry shapes that have a radius like circle cylinder and tube by length of the radius

      public RadialGeometry​(Color emissionLight, Material material, double radius)
      constructor for a new extended RadialGeometry object.
      Parameters:
      radius - the radius of the RadialGeometry
      emissionLight - for color of RadialGeometry
      material - the material of the RadialGeometry throws Exception in case of negative or zero radius
